attributes.action: Save our council run nurseries in north Tyneside, proposals are to close 6
attributes.background: Parents are campaigning against the closesures as they are a big help for vunable families though out north Tyneside, proposals are in place to close 6 council run nurseries for 2-3 year olds. Please help us stop this happening

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The issue is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

North Tyneside Council also has a petitions system:

http://www.northtyneside.gov.uk/browse.shtml?p_subjectCategory=1499
